name: Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon
effectText:
"Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" + "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
At the end of the Damage Step, if this Fusion Summoned card attacked, and this is the only face-up card you control: You can send 1 "Blue-Eyes" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck to the GY; this card can attack again in a row. You can use this effect of "Neo Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon" twice per turn. When a card or effect is activated that targets a "Blue-Eyes" monster(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.
